DOC.brief_summary: This study aims to assess the short term efficacy of a combination immunochemotherapy in patients with relapsed B-cell chronic lymphatic leukemia.
DOC.brief_title: Fludarabine, Cyclophosphamide, and Alemtuzumab in Patients With B-cell Chronic Lymphatic Leukemia (B-CLL)
DOC.criteria: BCLL in need of treatment One or two prior prior therapies WHO performance status 02 Serum creatinine > 1.5 ULN Major organ dysfunctions Pregnant or nursing
